Package org.transitime.core.predAccuracy

For measuring prediction accuracy, both from external prediction feed and for using internal predictions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NextBusPredictionAccuracyModule
    Reads in external prediction data a NextBus feed and stores the data in memory.
    PredAccuracyPrediction
    For prediction accuracy analysis.
    PredictionAccuracyModule
    Reads internal predictions every transitime.predAccuracy.pollingRateMsec and stores the predictions into memory.
    PredictionAccuracyModule.RouteAndStops
    For keeping track of which routes and stops to get predictions for.

Package org.transitime.core.predAccuracy Description

For measuring prediction accuracy, both from external prediction feed and for using internal predictions.

The prediction accuracy system is a Module that runs in a separate thread and polls a sampling of predictions every once in a while (every few minutes). The predictions are stored in memory. Can look at both internally generated predictions and ones from an external API feed. When the core system generates an arrival/departure then looks at predictions stored in memory to see if find corresponding one. If so then the corresponding prediction accuracy for that prediction is stored in the database. Then queries into the database can be made to determine prediction accuracy based on time, routes, etc.

Author:
SkiBu Smith
